20-Sep-2022 (00:03:16): I need your help! My sister broke her leg. I see her bone and I think it is a open fracture. She is bleeding as well. What are the instructions?
Put a clean dressing on the wound. If the bone is sticking out, put a bandage around it. Encourage the person to lie still and seek medical attention.
20-Sep-2022 (00:03:58): What can I do in order to prevent bleeding from her leg?
Have the person lie down and apply firm pressure to the wound. Help the person apply direct pressure for as long as it takes for help to arrive.
